channel.title: Hamachi problem
channel.description:
For some reason, I can't seem to connect to any Ham servers.
I join the existing network, enter the server name and pass correctly, but what do I do from here?
I tried to ping the server, but it timed out.
Browse does nothing, as far as I know.
Chat... ha, yeah right.
Copy address or block, not what I want to do.
Set label does nothing helpful.
So what did I do wrong?

@LittleMaffia wrote:

Just use a server without problems so easy…

item.title: Hamachi problem
item.dc:creator: @lKaddl lKaddl
item.description:
@lKaddl wrote:

Okay.

Say, I join a network. LexiScape for instance.

Joined. What now?

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi problem
item.dc:creator: @hartman hartman
item.description:
@hartman wrote:

this is easy…

ok so when you join the server you have no problems.but when you connect do you leave the server IP as 127.0.0.1?

if so then you need to get the hamachi adress(usually posted on thread) then type that as the server IP. Then you can log on.Also make sure your port is 43594 or the servers selected port.

Read full topic
